aatrox.tips: Focus on hitting your Q sweet spots for maximum damage. Use E to reposition during Q casts.

abilities.passive: Deathbringer Stance - Periodically empowers next attack to deal bonus damage
abilities.Q: The Darkin Blade - Three strikes with sweetspots at the edges
abilities.W: Infernal Chains - Launches chains that slow and can pull enemies
abilities.E: Umbral Dash - Short dash that can be used during other abilities
abilities.R: World Ender - Gains movement speed, AD, and healing

ahri.tips: Ahri excels at poking and kiting. Use your Orb of Deception to poke, and Charm to catch enemies off-guard.

abilities.passive: Essence Theft - Gains stacks of Essence Theft when hitting enemy champions with abilities
abilities.Q: Orb of Deception - Sends out and pulls back an orb, dealing magic damage
abilities.W: Fox-Fire - Releases fox-fires that target nearby enemies
abilities.E: Charm - Blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy
abilities.R: Spirit Rush - Dashes and fires essence bolts at nearby enemies

akali.tips: Use your shroud to reposition and wait for cooldowns. Manage your energy efficiently in extended trades.

abilities.passive: Assassin's Mark - Empowers auto attacks after leaving circle created by abilities
abilities.Q: Five Point Strike - Throws kunai in an arc, dealing damage and slowing
abilities.W: Twilight Shroud - Creates smoke cloud granting invisibility
abilities.E: Shuriken Flip - Flips backward and throws shuriken, can dash to marked targets
abilities.R: Perfect Execution - Two-part dash execution ability

akshan.tips: Use your swing to roam and catch enemies off guard. Save your revive for crucial teamfight moments.

abilities.passive: Dirty Fighting - Three-hit passive and revive mechanic
abilities.Q: Avengerang - Throwing weapon that deals damage going out and returning
abilities.W: Going Rogue - Camouflage and swing ability
abilities.E: Heroic Swing - Hooks to terrain and can be recast
abilities.R: Comeuppance - Locks onto enemy champions and fires multiple shots

alistar.tips: Master the W-Q combo for reliable engage. Use R to tower dive and tank objectives.

abilities.passive: Triumphant Roar - Heals nearby allies when crowd control is applied
abilities.Q: Pulverize - Knocks up nearby enemies
abilities.W: Headbutt - Dashes to and knocks back an enemy
abilities.E: Trample - Deals damage to nearby enemies and can stun
abilities.R: Unbreakable Will - Reduces incoming damage and removes crowd control

amumu.tips: Look for multi-champion ultimates in teamfights. Your Q is crucial for ganking lanes.

abilities.passive: Cursed Touch - Basic attacks curse enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage
abilities.Q: Bandage Toss - Throws bandages that stun and pull Amumu to an enemy
abilities.W: Despair - Deals continuous magic damage to nearby enemies
abilities.E: Tantrum - Reduces physical damage taken and damages nearby enemies
abilities.R: Curse of the Sad Mummy - Entangles nearby enemies, dealing magic damage

anivia.tips: Use wall to zone enemies and set up your Q stun. Your ultimate can zone entire areas in teamfights.

abilities.passive: Rebirth - After taking fatal damage, transforms into an egg and revives
abilities.Q: Flash Frost - Launches ice ball that damages and stuns
abilities.W: Crystallize - Creates an impassable wall of ice
abilities.E: Frostbite - Single target damage, doubled against chilled targets
abilities.R: Glacial Storm - Creates a blizzard that damages and chills enemies

annie.tips: Track your stun stacks carefully. Look for Flash-Tibbers opportunities on priority targets.

abilities.passive: Pyromania - Every 4th spell stuns the target
abilities.Q: Disintegrate - Single target damage spell that refunds mana on kill
abilities.W: Incinerate - Cone of fire damage
abilities.E: Molten Shield - Grants shield and reflects damage
abilities.R: Summon: Tibbers - Summons a bear that can be controlled

aphelios.tips: Plan your weapon rotations ahead of time. Each weapon combination offers unique playstyles.

abilities.passive: The Hitman and the Seer - Cycles through 5 weapons with unique effects
abilities.Q: Weapon Ability - Unique to each weapon
abilities.W: Phase - Swaps between main and off-hand weapon
abilities.E: Weapon Queue - Shows next weapon in rotation
abilities.R: Moonlight Vigil - Ultimate unique to main-hand weapon

ashe.tips: Use Hawkshot to track enemy jungler. Your arrow can initiate fights from long range.

abilities.passive: Frost Shot - Basic attacks slow enemies
abilities.Q: Ranger's Focus - Increases attack speed and damage
abilities.W: Volley - Fires multiple arrows in a cone
abilities.E: Hawkshot - Reveals an area of the map
abilities.R: Enchanted Crystal Arrow - Global stun projectile

abilities.passive: Cosmic Creator - Creates stars that orbit and deal damage
abilities.Q: Breath of Light - Fires a celestial breath that stuns
abilities.W: Astral Flight - Flies in target direction, gaining movement speed
abilities.E: Singularity - Creates a black hole that pulls enemies in
abilities.R: Falling Star/The Skies Descend - Calls down massive star for huge damage

azir.tips: Position your soldiers carefully for zone control. Save your shuffle combo for key moments.

abilities.Q: Conquering Sands - Commands soldiers to dash, dealing damage
abilities.W: Arise! - Summons a Sand Soldier to attack for Azir
abilities.E: Shifting Sands - Dashes to a soldier, gaining a shield
abilities.R: Emperor's Divide - Creates a wall of soldiers that knocks back enemies

bard.tips: Collect chimes to empower meeps. Use magical journey creatively for unique gank paths.

abilities.Q: Cosmic Binding - Fires missile that can stun two targets
abilities.W: Caretaker's Shrine - Places healing shrine that grants movement speed
abilities.E: Magical Journey - Creates portal through terrain
abilities.R: Tempered Fate - Places all units in stasis

blitzcrank.tips: Save hook for priority targets. Use W to reposition for hooks or escape.

abilities.Q: Rocket Grab - Pulls an enemy to Blitzcrank
abilities.W: Overdrive - Gains movement and attack speed
abilities.E: Power Fist - Empowered attack that knocks up
abilities.R: Static Field - Silences nearby enemies and deals damage

brand.tips: Land stun to guarantee other abilities. Ultimate bounces more in minion waves.

abilities.passive: Blaze - Abilities apply a burn that can be detonated
abilities.Q: Sear - Fires a fireball that stuns if target is ablaze
abilities.W: Pillar of Flame - Creates a pillar of flame after delay
abilities.E: Conflagration - Targeted fire ability that spreads to nearby units
abilities.R: Pyroclasm - Launches a bouncing fireball

braum.tips: Use Stand Behind Me to jump to allies in danger. Your shield can block crucial projectiles.

abilities.Q: Winter's Bite - Launches ice projectile that applies passive and slows
abilities.W: Stand Behind Me - Dashes to ally, granting them bonus resistances
abilities.E: Unbreakable - Raises shield that reduces damage from first hit and blocks projectiles

briar.tips: Use Blood Rush wisely to sustain in fights. Chain your crowd control for maximum impact.

abilities.passive: Crimson Blood - Gains bonus effects when below 50% health
abilities.Q: Blood Frenzy - Attacks in a frenzy, healing for damage dealt
abilities.W: Blood Rush - Gains movement speed and lifesteal
abilities.E: Blood Lunge - Lunges at target, dealing damage and stunning
abilities.R: Blood Possession - Takes control of enemy champion briefly

caitlyn.tips: Use traps to control zones and set up headshots. Your net can create distance and proc headshot.

abilities.W: Yordle Snap Trap - Places trap that roots and enables headshot

abilities.W: Tactical Sweep - Sweeps area, dealing damage and healing
abilities.E: Hookshot - Dashes to wall then can dash to target location stunning champions

abilities.passive: Serpentine Grace - Cannot purchase boots, gains movement speed per level
abilities.Q: Noxious Blast - Poisons target area, granting movement speed if it hits
abilities.W: Miasma - Creates pools that ground and slow enemies
abilities.E: Twin Fang - Single target damage, reduced cooldown on poisoned targets
abilities.R: Petrifying Gaze - Turns enemies facing her to stone

chogath.tips: Stack your ultimate on minions early. Chain CC with Q into W for guaranteed damage.

abilities.Q: Rupture - Creates circular area that knocks up enemies after delay
abilities.W: Feral Scream - Silences enemies in a cone
abilities.E: Vorpal Spikes - Empowers attacks with spikes that deal AOE damage

abilities.passive: Lightslinger - Second shot after ability use
abilities.Q: Piercing Light - Targeted linear skillshot
abilities.W: Ardent Blaze - Marks target granting movement speed
abilities.E: Relentless Pursuit - Dash that resets on kill
abilities.R: The Culling - Fires wave of shots in direction

lulu.tips: Use W on enemies to deny engage. Save ultimate for key threats.

abilities.passive: Pix, Faerie Companion - Assists with attacks and abilities
abilities.Q: Glitterlance - Fires bolts that slow
abilities.W: Whimsy - Polymorphs enemy or speeds up ally
abilities.E: Help, Pix! - Shields ally or damages enemy
abilities.R: Wild Growth - Knocks up enemies and grants health

lux.tips: Land Q to guarantee other abilities. Use E to check brushes.

abilities.passive: Illumination - Abilities mark targets for bonus damage
abilities.Q: Light Binding - Roots up to two enemies
abilities.W: Prismatic Barrier - Shields allies in line
abilities.E: Lucent Singularity - Creates zone that slows and damages
abilities.R: Final Spark - Fires long-range laser

malphite.tips: Stack armor for passive value. Use ultimate to engage on grouped enemies.

abilities.passive: Granite Shield - Gains shield based on maximum health
abilities.Q: Seismic Shard - Steals movement speed from target
abilities.W: Thunderclap - Empowers next attack and resets
abilities.E: Ground Slam - Reduces attack speed of nearby enemies
abilities.R: Unstoppable Force - Knocks up enemies in target area

malzahar.tips: Keep passive up for safety. Use voidlings to push waves and take objectives.

abilities.Q: Call of the Void - Creates zones of silence
abilities.W: Void Swarm - Summons voidlings to attack
abilities.E: Malefic Visions - Transfers between units on death
abilities.R: Nether Grasp - Suppresses target enemy champion

abilities.Q: Bramble Smash - Knocks back enemies and slows

abilities.E: Sapling Toss - Throws sapling that explodes
abilities.R: Nature's Grasp - Sends wave of roots that lock down enemies

master_yi.tips: Use Q to dodge key abilities. Time W to reduce burst damage.

abilities.passive: Double Strike - Every few attacks strikes twice
abilities.Q: Alpha Strike - Becomes untargetable and strikes multiple targets
abilities.W: Meditate - Channels to heal and reduce damage
abilities.E: Wuju Style - Gains true damage on attacks
abilities.R: Highlander - Gains movement speed and attack speed

miss_fortune.tips: Use passive on different targets. Position ultimate for maximum coverage.

abilities.passive: Love Tap - Deals bonus damage to new targets
abilities.Q: Double Up - Bounces to target behind, can crit
abilities.W: Strut - Gains movement speed out of combat
abilities.E: Make It Rain - Slows and damages in area
abilities.R: Bullet Time - Channels waves of bullets in cone

mordekaiser.tips: Pull enemies into passive. Use ultimate on key targets in teamfights.

abilities.passive: Darkness Rise - Deals damage to nearby enemies
abilities.Q: Obliterate - Isolated hits deal bonus damage
abilities.W: Indestructible - Gains shield and stores damage
abilities.E: Death's Grasp - Pulls enemies toward Mordekaiser
abilities.R: Realm of Death - Forces 1v1 in Death Realm

morgana.tips: Save black shield for key CC. Use ultimate with Zhonya's for team fights.

abilities.passive: Soul Siphon - Gains spell vamp against champions and large units
abilities.Q: Dark Binding - Roots target enemy and deals damage
abilities.W: Tormented Shadow - Creates pool that damages enemies
abilities.E: Black Shield - Shields ally from magic damage and CC
abilities.R: Soul Shackles - Chains nearby enemies, stunning after delay

nami.tips: Chain CC with Q into R. Use E on allies before they trade.

abilities.passive: Surging Tides - Abilities speed up allies
abilities.Q: Aqua Prison - Creates bubble that knocks up enemies
abilities.W: Ebb and Flow - Bounces between allies and enemies
abilities.E: Tidecaller's Blessing - Empowers ally's attacks
abilities.R: Tidal Wave - Sends wave that knocks up and slows

nasus.tips: Focus on stacking Q early. Use Wither on priority targets in fights.

abilities.Q: Siphoning Strike - Gains permanent damage on kills
abilities.W: Wither - Slows target's movement and attack speed
abilities.E: Spirit Fire - Reduces armor and deals damage over time
abilities.R: Fury of the Sands - Gains health, range, and AoE damage

nautilus.tips: Chain CC abilities for maximum lockdown. Hook walls for mobility.

abilities.passive: Staggering Blow - First attack roots target
abilities.Q: Dredge Line - Pulls self to enemy or terrain
abilities.W: Titan's Wrath - Gains shield and bonus damage
abilities.E: Riptide - Creates waves that slow enemies
abilities.R: Depth Charge - Knocks up enemies in path to target

neeko.tips: Use disguise to set up ultimate. Chain E into R for teamfight CC.
